meta.job_title: VP of People and Culture Systems and Technology

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the creation and implementation of a holistic HRIS strategy to ensure exceptional performance of people operations using state-of-the-art technology.
Define, drive, align, and deploy the vision, strategies, initiatives, and talent necessary to create and mature People and Culture systems.
Design, implement, and maintain processes and systems to organize and manage all employee data, files, and information in ways that are relevant, easy to manage, and compliant.
Analyze and make recommendations regarding HR system and process enhancements, and develop, configure, implement, and support HR systems and applications.
Monitor changes and improvements in HR systems' functionality and drive the implementation of new functionality that will benefit the organization.
Build strong partnerships with business leadership to understand decisions, improve processes, and gain value through systems, processes, and data.
Manage HR system migrations, enhancements, upgrades, projects, and new implementations, including vendor management for services and projects.
Support scalable, sustainable, reusable, and supportable solutions, and support Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion through Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field
